bonus.value: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to 15%/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for 5 seconds.
Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by 10%/12%/13%/15%. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

mind.name: Disoriented
mind.desc: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

memory.name: Blank Slate
memory.desc: Start writing the program for a completely new personality right now.

belief.name: Easy Does It
belief.desc: An amnesiac, just like you. Always tries to do whatever can be done first.

emotion.name: Innocent
emotion.desc: The stiff expression is a part of the package.
